content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. I'm glad you're interested in renting it. The apartment is located in a prime location in Munich, and it offers a lot of convenience for renters.

Regarding the rental price, I'm open to discussing it with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 euros per month.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mr. Li. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, I'm afraid I cannot accept your offer of 500 euros per month. The market rate for a 25-square-meter apartment in Munich is much higher than that.

I would like to propose a rental price of 700 euros per month, which is fair and reasonable for the size and location of the apartment. What do you think of this proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 700 euros per month.

Thank you for your negotiation skills. I am very impressed.

I have no questions about the utilities or anything else. I am just interested in the rental price.

Can you provide me with a contract to sign?

Thank you very much for your help.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you, Mr. Li. I'm glad we could reach an agreement on the rental price. I will prepare a contract for you to sign, and it will include all the necessary details regarding the rental agreement.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the contract. I'm here to help you in any way I can.

Once the contract is ready, I will send it to you via email. Please let me know if there's anything else I can do for you.

Thank you for choosing to rent the apartment from me, and I look forward to working with you in the future.
name: Heinrich Heine
